statement.p: In 34.78 of the last 46 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{46}}={0.3478}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{46}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3478}\cdot{46}={15.9988}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 46-15.9988=30.0012 We round that as requested to 30.
